name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Customer Engineer with a robust expertise in **SAP**, **SAP S/4HANA**, **SAP BW**, and **SAP Business Technology Platform**, complemented by 13+ years of experience in full stack development across healthcare and financial sectors. Proven proficiency in **data governance**, **data catalog**, and **data quality** management, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. Skilled in **data privacy**, enterprise architecture, and technical integration for enhanced data management. Strong background in **cost-benefit analysis** and **ROI analysis**, aiding in value-based selling strategies.

Additionally, adept in building high-performance applications utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** with expertise across frontend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, as well as backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. A strong advocate for compliance-driven development aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, with solid capabilities in MLOps leveraging **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
